Module com.example.pong_project
Package com.example.pong_project.Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pong_project.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
GameController class controls the game logic and the interaction between game components.

    • setGameCanvas

      public void setGameCanvas(javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas gameCanvas, javafx.scene.control.Button exitButton, javafx.stage.Stage gameStage, javafx.scene.Scene gameScene, String player1Name, String player2Name)
      setGameCanvas method Sets up the game canvas and the exit button
      Parameters:
      gameCanvas - - the game canvas
      exitButton - - the exit button
      gameStage - - the game stage
      gameScene - - the game scene
      player1Name - - the player 1 name
      player2Name - - the player 2 name

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame(String player1Name, String player2Name)
      initializeGame method is used to set up the game and play the game music. initializeGame method also sets up the player names.
      Parameters:
      player1Name - - name of player 1
      player2Name - - name of player 2

    • updateLayout

      private void updateLayout(double newWidth, double newHeight)
      updateLayout method is used to update the layout of the game canvas when its adjusted it sets the new size of the game canvas.
      Parameters:
      newWidth - - new width of the game canvas
      newHeight - - new height of the game canvas

    • setExitButtonLayout

      private void setExitButtonLayout(double newWidth, double newHeight)
      setExitButtonLayout method is used to set the layout of the exit button when the game canvas is adjusted
      Parameters:
      newWidth - - new width of the exit button
      newHeight - - new height of the exit button

      Parameters:

      This method is used to set the ball speed
      Parameters:
      ballSpeed - - ball speed

    • updatePlayerData

      private void updatePlayerData()
      The updatePlayerData method keeps track of the player scores and gets it to display on the screen during the game.

    • setRacketDims

      public void setRacketDims(int racketSize)
      setRacketDims method is used to set the racket dimensions
      Parameters:
      racketSize - - the size of the racket

    • setFinalScore

      public void setFinalScore(int finalScore)
      setFinalScore method is used to set the winning score that'll cause the game to end
      Parameters:
      finalScore - - the winning score

    • setPauseButton

      private void setPauseButton()
      setPauseButton method is used to set the pause button.

    • setResetButton

      private void setResetButton(javafx.stage.Stage gameStage, javafx.scene.Scene gameScene)

    • setExitButton

      private void setExitButton()
      setExitButton method is used to set the exit button. It prints exit button pressed to the console. It stops the racketThreadHandler and ballThreadHandler. It plays an exit sound. When the sound is finished it exits the game.
